articles.title: What Sports Drinks Should Athletes Consume?
articles.description: Sports drinks can help replace water, energy, and electrolytes lost during intense workouts.
news_list: Athletes should consider drinking sports drinks during high-intensity exercise that lasts longer than 45 minutes.
Electrolytes are essential minerals like calcium, potassium, and sodium that are vital for bodily function.
Sports drinks can be helpful before, during, and after exercise.
